name: World peace in salty desert
description:
Salar de Uyuni, Bolivia | 12/08/2007

"It' missing some of them, but it gives a rough idea of worldwide peace. Majestically standing still, all these flags sitting in the salty desert are like a surrealist United Nations moon headquarter entrance. I loved this place, I wanted to become a flag and have my 4 square inches area for my own, dying from cold night and hot days where used to lie a sea and now rests only salt."

The joy of colors contrasting the sadness of the black and white desert immediately caught our attention. The picture is so attractive that we wanted it in our shop straight away. And we do have others from the series, available on request. Just shout!

categories.name: Quality photographs - The Joy of the Journey

name: Mano a Mano (3)
description: Just arrived, soon described.

name: Place Vendôme, c'est chic !
description:
Place Vendôme, Paris, France | 14/09/2008

"Very lucky day to find in front of the Palais de Justice, one of the most beautiful buildings of the square, itself one of the most elegant pieces of architecture in Paris, a special advertising for a luxury brand with the sexiest car ever. to old time fashion, so fancy!"

We love this one and it is one of our best sellers. Indeed, the scenery is marvelous and sexy, elegant and charming. Recolored with a high level of detail, to enhance the romance and offer you the best of a glamourous picture.

name: Wedding party coffea break
description: Just arrived, soon described.

description: Just arrived, soon described.

name: Roof top chefs
description: Just arrived, soon described.

name: Autoportrait
description: Just arrived, soon described.

name: Sunset bombing
description:
San Carlos de Bariloche, Argentina | 8/08/2007

"Can't describe this non altered (means just as it was in plain view) sunset, real explosion of colours reflected in the peaceful lake of San Carlos de Bariloche. 4 minutes exposure by minus 10 degres to get this picture: look attentively at the sky and the water, everything is smooth and quiet. Gorgeous !"

The smooth effect is indeed due to the long exposure. The colours mix warm and cold feelings and that's why we like this one: it looks like a dreamed landscape although it's real, we can't know if it's frosty night or dog days, some kind of monster's cradle or angel's pool. Mystic, isn't it?

categories.name: Quality photographs - The Joy of the Journey

name: Moon night mountains pulpboard
description:
Val Thorens, Savoie | 24/12/2008

"2 minutes exposure to the moonlight gives you an unreal scenery, an image your eyes can't catch, a feeling your brain can't sense. No retouch, clean and original, you can slightly see the move of the stars, well our move actually. Just before Christmas I took this picture and I could stay all night staring silently at this breathtaking beauty. We are so so small, a dust on earth."

Unique vision of a night mountain landscape, beautiful and original, what else could we expect? Technically perfect, this picture is powerful and meaningful, the dark night cold colours and the deep perspective could frighten, but the mild clouds and warm lights relieve. Nice in small format, splendid on large canvas.

categories.name: Quality photographs - The Joy of the Journey

name: Spider glass
description:
Thames path-walk, London | 08/02/2012

"Disorder. Nervous breakdown. Chaos. Shot. Wounded. Fight. Sweet violence frozen for eternity. Fossilized in ice or just broken glass. It's amazing how man is inspired by nature, but how many tries it takes to never attain the same beauty and perfection of an actual spider’s web..."

An abstract picture, very interesting indeed. Especially in large format, to appreciate the definition, get the full details of this amazing "spider glass".

name: Old fashion beach hotel
description:
DeHaan, Belgium | 12/06/2009

"Would you have a sunbath here? At least you won't see this building! I couldn't resist having this architectural piece of non-art in my camera. Interesting lines, funny people, the lonely atmosphere creates an all over bizarre scenic."

This picture is so interesting. Something peculiar is floating in this building. It comes maybe from the empty spaces (as it would be off peak time) against the people having a regular sunbath (as it would be a dog day in mid summer). On canvas the architectural effect is spectacular and truly brings out to this contemporary piece of art.

categories.name: Quality photographs - The Joy of the Journey

name: Lonely man looking for salt crystal
description:
Salar de Uyuni, Bolivia | 12/08/2007

"As a poor lonesome cowboy, our driver walked through the desert to a random point where he suddenly stopped and started digging. Silently, with controlled movements, as if he knew exactly what he was doing, but you haven't got a clue. He dug his arm in the hole up to his shoulder, and bought out a large, clean, breathtaking and gorgeous crystal of salt, one feet large".

We loved the magnificence of Uyuni desert. Those who have been to this place know: one of the most beautiful deserts on earth, surrounded by mountains looming and floating all around. In large size this picture is a call for relaxing contemplation; we have some others from the same place, so if you love it just shout.

categories.name: Quality photographs - The Joy of the Journey

name: Oldfashion beach rest
description:
DeHaan, Belgium | 12/06/2009

"Sunbath part 2. Facing the sun or facing the sea, hard choice... They choose to face the sun, and me. Although they stay dressed and protected from the sun; How odd? I love them."

This is the second part of the series, on a landscape format. Please note that the format chosen below will have to be adapted to the landscape specific format of this picture, therefore you will get a smaller height than usual for the same width. Good fun this picture, though.

categories.name: Quality photographs - The Joy of the Journey

name: Indian escape
description:
Ambert fort, Jaïpur, India | 18/07/2011

"Just as a ghost who tries to escape the heat, this woman is running along this wall as if it was on fire. I tell you, with 41°C in the shadow, it was pretty much the same. I caught her, all in red with her beautiful and colorful red sari. Touching ghost..."

You can feel the heat, you can feel the joy of color and the sadness of this woman leaving this desert of stone with her child. We like the decency and modesty of this picture. Here there is nobody to be sorry for, just a quiet and warm beauty.

categories.name: Quality photographs - The Joy of the Journey

name: Very close and Incredibly quiet
description:
Col des Saisies, Savoie - France | 22/08/2009

"Lucky time! Have a look at this robust dragonfly, so fragile, delicate, graceful. Caught at the right moment, I really thought it stayed on purposed, feeling observed, willing to become a star of its kind. 
Stare at the dragonfly before it leaves straight to the sky."

We liked the light and brightness of this picture. The dragonfly is pure and clean-cut, although ready to fly away. Dany has here managed very well to capture the moment, immortalise a scene we can't really see so often, the full beauty of mother nature.

name: No man's snow
description:
L'Alpe, Sauzes | 21/02/2011

"I have not been on the moon but I have been on the snow where no one has been before. Until me and until the snow falls again. This is the chance of virgin snow: you always feel like a explorer, a pioneer, first arrived to discover the breathtaking purity of a snowy landscape."

This abstract picture is really amazing printed on a large format. Peaceful and relaxing, you will enjoy the thud of the snow. The curved waves are like an echo to this silence. A smooth and sweet poem to decorate a bedroom and sleep peacefully.

categories.name: Quality photographs - The Joy of the Journey

name: You are the Artist!
description:
This is your unique opportunity to have a picture you already love decorating your home. Because pictures sometimes need a bit of altering, because the composition, aperture, color, often needs to be optimized, we will make your picture look professional and ready to be printed. You can relax and let us do the enhancement as well as the printing. Just enjoy receiving the gift at home.

How does it work? 
1- You buy this product in the size you wish to receive your picture printed 
2- You select a picture of your collection and send it to us through email, 
3- We enhance it (aperture, colour, composition), 
4- You let us know if you are happy with the enhancement, 
5- We have it printed on professional paper or canvas and delivered to your door. 
Easy!
